channel.title: LaTeX on Erick Chacón
channel.description: Recent content in LaTeX on Erick Chacón

item.title: Fancy Class for Scientific Reports
item.description: ReasearchNotes is a LaTex class that provides a nice template for scientific notes and reports. You can also use it for lecture notes, tutorial, labs or as you want to use. Compatible with SimpleNotes class.

item.title: Simple Integration Between Markdown and Latex
item.description: SimpleDown is pandoc template with less dependancies as possible for compatibility with LaTex clases.

item.title: Simple Class for Scientific Reports
item.description: SimpleNotes is a LaTex class that provides a simple template for scientific notes and reports. You can also use it for lecture notes, tutorial, labs or as you want to use. It is compatible with ResearchNotes class.

item.title: Thesis Class for National University of Engineering
item.description: UniThesis is a LaTex class that provides a template for thesis of the National University of Engineering (Lima - Peru).

item.title: LancsThesis LaTex Class
item.description: LancsThesis is a LaTex class that provides a template for thesis of the Lancaster University of Engineering (Lancaster - United Kingdom). It can be customized for other universities.

item.title: Upgrade Debian Wheezy to Debian Jessie
item.description: In this last week, I updated my RStudio in Debian Wheezy and it turned out that it needed a more recent version of the package lib6. A reliable solution was to upgrade my system to Jessie, the current stable distribution of Debian.

item.title: Thesis Template in Latex (UNI)
item.description: Some months ago, I finished my undergraduate thesis and I modified the ClemsonThesis project made by Andrew R. Dalton in order to customize and create the UniThesis.cls class in LaTeX as a template for undergraduate tesis at Universidad Nacional de Ingeniería (UNI).
